term.title: closo-

item.text: An affix used in names to denote a cage or closed structure, especially a boron skeleton that is a polyhedron having all triangular faces.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 30, 681. 'Nomenclature of Inorganic Boron Compounds' on page 686 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197230030681)
